scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two male figures, identified as Saint Peter and Saint Paul, standing in an outdoor landscape. Saint Peter, on the left, is depicted with a halo, wearing a pink robe over a blue tunic, and holding a large book and a set of keys. Saint Paul, on the right, also with a halo, wears a purple robe and holds a large sword. Behind them, to the right, is a stone castle with towers and windows. The background features rolling hills, a body of water, and a blue sky with clouds. The figures are presented in a devotional context, representing the two principal apostles of Christianity.
